text: Hours incorrect. Apparently employees make up own hours. Look at the reviews. Many people show up to a closed store. name: will stark
text: Probably some of the best pizza in the area if you like a thicker crust and plenty of tomato sauce. They tend to be a bit slower than other pizza places at higher traffic times though. Their subs also tend to be quite good as long as they're still hot. They don't sqimp on salad toppings like most places either.

name: Mea C
text: The pizza was delicious the sodas were fresh. And the staff were so nice. I will definitely take my family here again.

name: T Hale
text: I gave 5 stars because of the store manager Shan. I had a previously bad experience there and wasn't planning on returning. She gave me a call to discuss the matter. She apologized for the mishap and went ABOVE and BEYOND to make sure I was satisfied. Customer service like that would keep me coming back. Thanks, Shan!

name: Amanda Backinger
text: Decided to give Hungry Howies another try. Ordered at 11:30 am, receipt said order will be ready in 15 minutes. Arrived at 11:55am, order has not even been made yet. Poor excuse of an establishment, angry I wasted my time.
